# bunkerweb_config_upload_update (Ephemeral Resource)

Updates an existing custom configuration by uploading file content, optionally renaming or moving it.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String, Sensitive) File content to upload.
- `name` (String) Current configuration name.
- `type` (String) Current configuration type.

### Optional

- `file_name` (String) File name used for the upload part. Defaults to the current configuration name.
- `new_name` (String) Optional new configuration name.
- `new_service` (String) Optional service to move the configuration into.
- `new_type` (String) Optional new configuration type.
- `service` (String) Current service identifier; defaults to `global` when omitted.

### Read-Only

- `result` (String, Sensitive) JSON-encoded response payload returned by the API.
